attributes.action: Make Mental Health medication free on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: I have recently lost my job to Coronavirus, I ran out of my mental health medication a few days ago, meaning I haven’t taken them in a few days as it is. I went to the pharmacy and explained my situation. They explained there was nothing they could do because I was 20, I was denied my medication.
attributes.background: Make mental health related prescriptions free for those of any age under the NHS
